key.name: expo-key
key.description: Initiate or terminate Expo mode with this keyboard shortcut.

key.name: expo-button
key.description: Initiate or terminate Expo mode with this mousebutton shortcut.

key.name: expo-edge
key.description: Initiate or terminate Expo mode by moving the pointer to this corner or edge of your screen(s).

key.name: double-click-time
key.description: Timeframe to execute a double-click (in ms). (50 - 2000)

key.name: dnd-button
key.description: Drag and drop windows in Expo with this mousebutton.

key.name: exit-button
key.description: End Expo mode with this mousebutton.

key.name: next-vp-button
key.description: Button binding to focus the next viewport in Expo mode.

key.name: prev-vp-button
key.description: Button binding to focus the previous viewport in Expo mode.

key.name: zoom-time
key.description: Duration of the selected animation (in seconds). (0.1 - 5.0)

key.name: expo-immediate-move
key.description: Should window movements in Expo mode be immediate - this among other things disables wobbliness.

key.name: expo-animation
key.description: The animation used when initiating or leaving Expo. (0 = Zoom, 1 = Fade + Zoom, 2 = Vortex, 3 = None)

key.name: deform
key.description: The deformation of the Expo wall. (0 = None, 1 = Tilt, 2 = Curve)

key.name: curve
key.description: Strength of the deformation in curve mode. (0.0 - 1.0)

key.name: x-offset
key.description: Horizontal offset (in pixels). ( - )

key.name: y-offset
key.description: Vertical offset (in pixels). ( - )

key.name: y-bottom-offset
key.description: Vertical offset from the bottom (in pixels). (0 - )

key.name: distance
key.description: The distance between the camera and the exposed viewports. (0.0 - 1.0)

key.name: vp-distance
key.description: The distance between viewports in Expo mode. (0.0 - 1.0)

key.name: aspect-ratio
key.description: The relation of the viewports' width to height in Expo mode. (0.0 - 1.0)

key.name: hide-docks
key.description: Hide panels and docks in Expo mode.

key.name: mipmaps
key.description: Generate mipmaps for higher quality textures in Expo mode.

key.name: multioutput-mode
key.description: How the Expo wall should be displayed, if multiple output devices are used. (0 = One big wall, 1 = One wall per output)

key.name: vp-brightness
key.description: The brightness of unfocused viewports (in percent). (0.0 - 100.0)

key.name: vp-saturation
key.description: The saturation of unfocused viewports (in percent). (0.0 - 100.0)

key.name: selected-color
key.description: Color and opacity of the glow texture that highlights the selected viewport.

key.name: reflection
key.description: Render a realtime reflection of the viewports on the ground.

key.name: ground-color1
key.description: Color and opacity of the ground (near).

key.name: ground-color2
key.description: Color and opacity of the ground (far).

key.name: ground-size
key.description: Size of the ground the reflection is rendered on. (0.0 - 1.0)

key.name: scale-factor
key.description: The vertical scale factor of the ground reflection. (0.0 - 2.0)
